body.name: Sunny Health & Fitness Row-N-Ride Squat Assist Trainer for Glutes Workout With Adjustable Resistance, Easy Setup & Foldable Exercise Equipment, Glute & Leg Exercise Machine

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Sunny Health & Fitness Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: 【ALL-IN-ONE HOME FITNESS】Squats with precision, engage in dynamic rowing exercises, target your glutes for toning, sculpt your abs, and undertake strength training. The all-in-one fitness solution for a well-rounded and diverse workout experience.

【CUSTOMIZABLE SQUAT ASSIST】Tailor your squat workouts with adjustable motion settings at 30, 60, and 90 degrees, ensuring a personalized and effective training experience to match your fitness level and goals.
【CONNECTED FITNESS EXPERIENCE】Sync via Bluetooth to monitor progress, tailor workouts, and explore over 1000 training videos, 10,000 global tours, diverse fitness programs, and community engagements.

【DEVICE HOLDER & METRIC TRACKING】The LCD monitor keeps you informed with real-time data on calories burned, workout duration, and total count. The built-in device holder keeps you entertained and connected during your workouts.

【ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE LEVELS】Tailor your workouts to your fitness level with 4 resistance levels, allowing you to customize the intensity of your exercises and progressively challenge yourself, ensuring a versatile and effective fitness experience.

【ENHANCED COMFORT AND FIT】Adjustable handlebar with 4 different length settings, accommodating users of all sizes, providing a customized grip. Additionally, the adjustable padded seat is designed to ensure comfortable and supportive workout.
【HASSLE-FREE SETUP】Enjoy the convenience of easy assembly, designed for straightforward setup, allowing you to start your fitness journey quickly and without any complications.

【SAFE & DURABLE DESIGN】Built with a sturdy frame, ensures stability and durability during even the most rigorous workouts. With a weight limit of up to 220 LB, accommodating a wide range of users for safe and effective exercise sessions.

【Sunny Health & Fitness Commitment】A top fitness brand for 20+ years, offers superior products and a dedication to excellence. Count on our committed customer service and enjoy peace of mind with a 1-year warranty on the structural frame.
body.description: Develop strength, speed, and leanness with the Sunny Health & Fitness P2100 Home Squat Machine in Pink! Strengthen not only your lower body but your shoulders, arms, and back. This exerciser promotes compound movement (two or more muscle groups working cohesively). Activating groups of muscles together requires more strength, so you’ll burn more calories. Compound exercises bring compounded results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love using this
reviews.reviewText: This is actually enjoyable to use. I really like this, i was looking for something that gave motion that wasn’t uncomfortable or boring. Something that worked the main groups and made hard work seem easy. This is the thing that i was looking for. And it was affordable. I really like this machine. Its fun to use and its easy to adjust the difficulty. And you can make it pretty difficult. Put the seat all the way down and attach the resistance bands and it will challenge you. Adjust the other way and remove the bands and its comfortable and more cardio oriented. I like this much more than an elliptical or a rowing machine. Great little machine. Sturdy and quiet. Wont be a coat rack if you have any type of motivation at all. This is worth the price and the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great addition to my home gym! The price is great. It was very easy to put together and folds for easy storage. You can get an excellent cardio workout and this machine really targets and strengthens your lower body. Quads, gluten and hamstrings. It's perfect for me since I have an issue with one of my knees. I can use this and get the lower body workout I want and it doesn't bother my knee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good so far with a couple of caveats
reviews.reviewText: I'm a person who typically exercises regularly: Hiking, cycling, weight lifting -- but an illness followed by a major orthopedic injury has had me in healing mode for over a year and as a result, I'm seriously de-conditioned. I ordered this little machine to help me ease back into a fitness routine and so far, it seems to be just the right piece of equipment. Please note that you will need a ratchet/socket set to assemble and you will need to purchase an equipment mat if this machine will be placed on a hard floor to prevent "walking" during use. Also, the instructions look more complicated than is necessary. I recommend searching for "Row-N-Ride Assembly" on YouTube. The machine comes about 90% assembled; if not for the quality-control problem that I ran into (see below), I would've had this thing put together in about 15 minutes.The good: Inexpensive, lightweight, easy to maneuver, REALLY targets quads and glutesThe burn is real. I had to start off with a very light workout because my legs were screaming after a few minutes.The bad:The major issue is one that I didn't see discussed in the few reviews I read prior to purchase. Made-in-China quality control, such as it is, is evident here. As mentioned above, this machine comes almost fully assembled. The only components that the user must attach are the feet, the pedals, the handlebar, the seat, and the digital display. With the video instructions, assembly goes very quickly. However, mine came pre-assembled incorrectly. The entire central assembly was bolted in backward and upside-down, so I ended up having to take the entire thing apart and reverse/flip the central component that has the pedals and handlebar at opposite ends. That added another 30 minutes or so to the assembly time.I"ll add that the light mass means that this machine also feels a little flimsy, so it remains to be seen how well it will hold up over time with regular use, which I anticipate. I'll be glad to update my review with any new observations. If I end up liking this one, I'll probably step up to the upgraded version down the road. Still, for the price, I'm overall satisfied so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW!! What an unexpected workout.
reviews.reviewText: Updated after 10 days of use: I have been using this product for 10 days, 15 minutes a day, pulsing for 30 seconds every 3 minutes otherwise using a full range of motion. After 4 days I felt confident to start using 1 resistance band during my 15 minute workout. I was able to burn 100 calories in a 15 minute workout. I lost 2 inches on my hips ONLY adjusting my workout routine by using this product. Day 1: black pants. Day 10: gray pants. Noticeable tightening and toning. No weight loss.Day 1 of use: First of all, I bought this machine used on here with a major imperfection for $42. I figured it was worth a shot after looking at the dB method and realizing that it was out of my budget. Honestly, I liked this one more because this one also works the upper body. The imperfection on my machine was a missing bolt that allowed the seat to communicate with the handle bars—I just found a bolt wah-lah! And the monitor came completely smashed. I wasn’t planning to use that anyway since I look at my Nokia fit screen for my calories and heart rate ( I have a heavy duty stand that attaches to any of my workout equipment to display it). Anyway, the machine provides a superb workout. I already have larger thighs but need some toning in my glutes so I was worried that this machine would over work my thighs, and was looking for a machine that isolated my glutes. What I can say is that with this machine, you feel no burn in your calves, but you feel an intense burn in your lower mid back/butt, and latts. I never thought I would own a piece of cardio equipment that worked out the lower back so efficiently. I would NOT rely on this machine to tone your upper back and arms. You are going to need a rowing machine for that. BUT WOW, this machine is so worth it because it does isolate the glutes, and an unbelievable lower back workout that is way more fun than Superman’s. I have a resting heart rate of 48 and I did this machine for 10 minutes and my heart rate was a steady 130 the entire time with no added resistance bands. It’s not a great cardio exercise, but it’s awesome that it is isolating key muscle groups that are really hard to isolate on any other machine. ONE THING TO NOTE. On the DB website it shows you can isolate your triceps by working out with the seat, you can also do that with this seat as long as you put 2-3 resistance bands on the seat. You cannot work your abs with this seat because it’s not piston driven—it’s driven by your own body weight with resistance bands. Hope this helps you guys. If you are considering this machine even for a moment, it’s seriously worth it. Best Buy I’ve had in awhile.

I enjoy this upright rowing machine. Assembly was easy enough for me to do by myself in less than 30 minutes. The item feels sturdy. I like that it folds up to take up less space when not in use. You can adjust the tension level for a more effective work out. Very simple to use. If you are a beginner you can leave the tension strap hooked under the seat for no added tension and it still gives a work out. I like that it works multiple areas of the body at once. All in all I would recommend this machine.
Es fácil de armar y no ocupa mucho espacio, es muy bueno para el precio tiene tres niveles de resistencia dependiendo el que quieras hacer de fácil a difícil, me gustó mucho
Tres simple dutilisation, efficasse sur tout le corps, tres contente, top qualité
Me ha gustado como lo mandaron. Me llevó 15 min montarlo . El aparato viene con las partes difíciles ya montada por lo que resulta muy fácil acabar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: For the price I was expecting it would not be a strong piece of equipment and was amazed how well built this is! Not too difficult to put together either as most of it came bolted together. Nearly all bolts and screws attached so that you wouldn't need to go hunting for them or checking you have enough when attaching 4 other bits of the frame!Over a few days of use the performance has been great. I have looked at various videos of their recommended exercises and I'm already getting results in my fitness level. I'm seeing some toning of legs, arms and core. I've still a long way to go to achieve my fitness goals but with regular use I can see this will do the trick.Really happy I got this and of course it folds together making it great to stand against a wall, under the bed, stairs or in a cupboard. Can't fault this gym equipment.I bought a treadmill from some other company before this purchase which cost me 2 1/2 times the price and it was dreadful. The belt would slide around and just walking or jogging on it was a limited form of exercise. I had to return it. I was just lucky to see an equivalent model of the row n ride advertised on QVC which was an old video. After some research of the different models I decided to to go for the Sunny Health & Fitness one. I don't regret it.I'm looking to having an all-over toned body with a strong flat core. I'm no young 20 something either! But exercising will improve anyone's body whatever their age!
